agreement.title: Software Agreement
content: Free and Open Source: This software is a completely free open source project. We encourage users to freely use, modify, and distribute the software in accordance with the provisions of the AGPLv3 license.

Commercial Use Prohibited: Without our explicit written consent, it is prohibited to use this software for any commercial purposes. This includes selling, leasing, or otherwise commercially utilizing the software as part of a product or service.

Official Channels Only: To ensure that users receive the latest and most secure version of the software, we strongly recommend that users download the software only from our official channels. We do not provide support for or guarantee the security of software versions obtained from non-official channels.
Disclaimer: The software is provided 'as is' without any form of warranty. We will not be liable for any damages, losses, or costs arising from the use or inability to use this software.

Privacy Policy: This software does not collect, store, or process any personal data. We do not require users to provide any personal information and do not use any form of data tracking within the software.

Security Statement: We are committed to providing a secure software experience. Although our software does not collect user data, we still implement appropriate security measures to protect the integrity and performance of the software.

Open Source License: This software is released under the GNU Affero General Public License version 3 (AGPLv3). The full text of the license can be found at the following link: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.html.

Contribution and Community: We encourage users to contribute code and participate in our open source community. If you have any questions about the license or wish to contribute code, please contact us.
agreement.agree: Agree and Comply with this Agreement

Update log.title: Update Log|x･`)(Will update on time)
100: Can use EFMod as game extension
120: Change Mod file format and new file system
No longer carries Chinese localized version, but pure original version
Optimize Mod installation, reading, and activation speed
121: Optimize Mod and Loader reading speed
Prevent silly/misoperation during installation of incorrect files
150: Support two working modes: Shared and External
Note: Some features may not work or may not have the expected effect, please understand QAQ
151: Improve all functions except for the game panel
Bidirectional updates for Mod private directories
Update Mod standards, support multiple languages
Note: This version is 1.5.5 Stable, long-term stable, slow updates, debugging/testing can choose weekly builds
200: Rewrite pages: Settings, Mod Management, Kernel Management
Switch language/theme without restarting the software
